function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of clear and targeted messaging in different regions","Impact":"Miscommunication and confusion leading to inconsistent adherence to public health measures","Mitigation":"Tailoring messages to specific regional contexts and demographics, and ensuring consistent communication","Technologies":"Data analytics for regional trends, targeted messaging platforms","People":"Public, government officials","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Reliance on complex multidimensional mobility index data","Impact":"Difficulty in interpreting and acting on the data, leading to delayed or inappropriate policy decisions","Mitigation":"Simplifying the data into actionable visual metrics, and providing training for authorities on data interpretation","Technologies":"Data visualization tools, training in data analytics","People":"Authorities, policymakers","Owner":"Data analysts, technology experts"},{"Description":"Rapid development of data resource without comprehensive planning","Impact":"Risk of inaccuracies, biases, and incomplete data leading to flawed policy decisions","Mitigation":"Systematic planning, testing, and validation of data sources and algorithms before implementation","Technologies":"Quality assurance tools, data validation algorithms","People":"Data scientists, developers","Owner":"Data governance authorities"}]}
